data.actual_result: You don't see some native emotes. This doesn't happen for some specific emotes but rather depends upon the number of characters present in the topic
data.expected_result: You should be able to see the native emotes
data.short_description: Native emotes are not visible in the channel topic
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel you can edit - Go to channel settings and edit the channel topic to contain some native emotes - Save the changes and observe the channel topic
